amendment.description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds in this bill from being used to list the Salina Mucket or the Mexican Fawnsfoot species of mussels found in the Rio Grande River as endangered or their habitat as critical.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
